name: wordpress-development
description: This project aims to integrate the latest version of Wordpress with Mashery's API Management Service. It is composed of three parts:

scripts.initial: npm run build && docker run --name wordpress -d -p 8080:80 -v $PWD/integration:/var/www/wp-content/plugins/mashery-integration -v $PWD/admin:/var/www/wp-content/plugins/mashery-admin -v $PWD/theme:/var/www/wp-content/themes/mashery -t mashery/wordpress
